mapper.select:
select * from ( select * from vi_recruit_write recruit
where recruit_no = #{no} and recruiting_state = 1 and recruit_date_end > current_date() ) recruit
join (select form_service_name, form_service_type from vi_form_service) form_service on recruit.form_service = form_service.form_service_type join (select graduate_state, level from vi_school_level) school on recruit.school_level = school.level join (select * from vi_address) address on recruit.address_no = address.address_no join (select sub_name, city_code from vi_city_code) city on address.city_code = city.city_code join (select area_code, name from vi_area_code) area on address.area_code = area.area_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vi_recruit_write ( title, company_no, career_state, career_start, career_end, school_level, year_pay_start, year_pay_end, age_count_start, age_count_end, gender, assigned_task, form_service, recruit_count, recruit_date_start, recruit_date_end, recruit_form, recruit_form_file_no, address_no, day_of_week, master, phone_number, recruiting_state ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{companyNo}, #{careerState}, #{careerStart}, #{careerEnd}, #{schoolLevel}, #{yearPayStart}, #{yearPayEnd}, #{ageCountStart}, #{ageCountEnd}, #{gender}, #{assignedTask}, #{formService}, #{recruitCount}, #{recruitDateStart}, #{recruitDateEnd}, #{recruitForm}, #{recruitFormFileNo}, #{addressNo}, #{dayOfWeek}, #{master}, #{phoneNumber}, #{recruitingState} )
